articles.author: Kevin Borba
articles.title: Why Fernando Mendoza’s dad won’t stand up during CFP national championship - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The father of Indiana Hoosiers quarterback Fernando Mendoza makes an effort to stay seated throughout the game.
articles.content: Fernando Mendoza and the No. 1-seed Indiana Hoosiers are set to face off against the No. 10-seed Miami Hurricanes on Monday in the College Football Playoff National Championship, for what would be th… [+2194 chars]
